text: Is there a way to pull this in dynamically, so that I don’t HAVE to use that specific menu in this module?

is this in a module? Or is it a partial? If its in a module you can just use a menu field and grab the menu id from there. I would likely build it this way.

If it’s a partial you could use a menu tag and set it that way but its kind of a more confusing UX experience for content editors.

Or if it’s a partial you would want to make it a global partial and then you could make a smaller menu module that just gets reused as mentioned in your image and above, as needed.
